generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by sidewalks and trees.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and trees.
- building: Multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, featuring windows and architectural details typical of urban structures.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage are planted along the sidewalks and road, casting shadows on the pavement.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy, appearing bright and clear.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, including a silver car in the foreground and a white van further down.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole at the intersection ahead on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign is visible on a pole on the right side of the road, near the traffic light.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic light and traffic signs, as well as utility poles along the sidewalk.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, further down the street.
